description:
Dash away to escape a foe,
or close the distance for a melee attack..
name: Dash
note:
<towardsMove>
<absSettings>
cooldown: 30
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
user lock
move forward 200 0 true
user speed inc 3
user moveHere true
user speed dec 3
</absSequence>
